title: Oprah's Lifeclass
resume: Oprah's Lifeclass is an Emmy Award-winning American primetime television show hosted and produced by Oprah Winfrey, airing on OWN: Oprah Winfrey Network. The first episode premiered on Monday October 10, 2011 at 8/7c.
